summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 8 January to end of Saturday 8 January GMT
description: Saturday is forecast to be very wet. A continuing Atlantic breeze will keep pollution 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/><br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
